extendedInfo.description: Protect your plan from overcharges with Data Usage Defenderâââââ "As useful as it is beautiful"âââââ "Can potentially help you tier down to a lower data plan rate"âââââ "Most popular app of its class in AppStore"Featuring:* Firewall to control usage on an app-by-app basis (Android 2.2+, unavailable on Dell Streak)* Redesigned UI (Sleek new design)* Usage per app statistics* Usage per day statistics* Floating window display (shows Plan usage % and current download speed in a convenient and discreet overlay on your home screen)* Speed test (to check your current download and upload potential* Advanced data usage prediction to help you stay on track with plan* 2 widget styles â Tracking: edit your settings to provide early alerts when usage reaches a preset limit.  â Simple setup: Edit and customize your profile in seconds: Set your monthly data limit, billing cycle days . That's it!Data Usage Defender works flawlessly on the majority of Android phone models (more than 400 devices) but with all the Android stock and custom ROMs and all manufacturers' custom layers (such as HTC Sense) plus all sorts of installed application combinations it is difficult to ensure a perfect user experience. Please be understanding and positive if you find bugs or experience difficulties. Give us feedback and we will fix the problem to the best of our abilities. Thank you for your support and we look forward to your continual satisfaction with our product, Data Usage Defender.**************************If you find any bugs within the app or have any suggestions please send us an email detailing the problem. Leaving 1 star on the Android Market does little to help in fixing the bug and is not as effective as sending a direct email to us at liangqs@wali.com. We will respond within 24 hours. Please support us as we work hard to produce top-quality apps.**************************To search Data Usage Defender, you may try with Key Words: Data Usage ,data plan, traffic, package, network, 3G, LTE, 4G, GPRS, WiFi, EDGE, data, speed, carrier, China Mobile, China Unicom, network package, speed test, save billing, download, battery, DataUsage, watchdog, firewall, watchdog

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.comment: This app is very user friendly. It is easy on the battery even though it runs all the time in the deck ground. I recommend it to all my android friends. GREATJOB developers!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Easy to use, makes sense, great app
reviews.comment: I looked at many different apps and this seems to be the best one for data usage.  It works as described without glitches and gives you relevant information.  Also you can set limits on your usage. Works great with my HTC One AT&T.
reviews.author: Zauhn Burgey

reviews.title: Galaxy S4
reviews.comment: This app does not work on galaxy s4.  Only WI-FI will be counted.  Data will not be counted.  Is this being resolved or will it be?  Love the app thought it worked on my Samsung Galaxy S2 Skyrocket before, needs fixed before using again.
reviews.author: steven smith

reviews.title: It has potential
reviews.comment: I used it on my previous phone and had a fantastic run with it, but when I upgraded to an LTE phone, it wouldn\'t detect the 4G usage. If they fix this issue, I\'ll start using this app again.
reviews.author: Yohan Kim

reviews.title: Incompatible with HTC One M7
reviews.comment: while the app loads, but does not count data or update widgets on the HTC One M7. emailed support to no response.
reviews.author: mcintoan

reviews.title: Superior
reviews.comment: Use on my S3 and love it.  I don\'t come near to using up all my data each month but this allows me to see where my date is being used easily. Fantastic app. Best data monitoring app I seen yet.
reviews.author: Kenny Cochrane

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: I have used onavo count before and had a lot of problems with... This app seems to.solve all my problem...very attractive interface...ooens up quickly and does not require much memory..
reviews.author: shikhar agrawal

reviews.title: Data inaccurate
reviews.comment: Overestimates data use hugely. Says I\'ve used over 1G overnight. Do I surf the net in my sleep? ETA: Now says I\'ve used three times my actual data. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great and nice features!
reviews.comment: It beats the others and has some really nice features. The floating speed widget is a good way to make sure your not using any data and monitor usage. Handy!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good app like this type of apps. Simple and super..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not work
reviews.comment: Did data test and it errored. Updated 19 apps and it didnt show a single change in data consumed or data up/down
reviews.author: Gabriel McDonald

reviews.title: Fantastic app
reviews.comment: Great app, real-time data reporting. Only drawback is not being able to switch units (KB/MB/GB). Otherwise, best app I\'ve tested so far.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: how to root
reviews.comment: this is good applicantion ..but can anyone tell me how to root it for using firewall function.. i m using samsung note 2 n-7100
reviews.author: Jai Gupta

reviews.title: A ronseal product...
reviews.comment: Does exactly what it says on the tin, tried a ton of programs like this looking for a good one. This is the only one that keeps it simple, works like clockwork and doesnt leave you confused. Also, it splits your usage so you no longer have to guess as to how much data was sent via free WiFi.   Only gripe is that med widget dont work on Xperia s.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good on whole but except hang in occasions.
reviews.comment: Good app which i have evee seen.. mind blowing performance with keeping how much data is left over.. very good for 3g mob. Not suitable for 2g and LTE. Some time it hangs which forces us to uninstall.
reviews.author: Madhu G Varadaraj

reviews.title: Awesome but widget not wrking
reviews.comment: Accurate n trouble free Love it But widget dont wrk on galaxy note
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great free apps
reviews.comment: Its run perfect on my sgs ics
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A must have if you have to monitor data usage...
reviews.comment: Data Usage Defender is one of the best free apps I\'ve come across. Not only do you get helpful programmable widgets that tell you how much data you\'ve used to the kilobyte per month, it also has an extremely helpful firewall (root required) to lock programs you don\'t want using cellular data down. It even has a breakdown of what type of data (cellular and wifi) your apps consume. Doesn\'t get any better!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent!!
reviews.comment: This is EXACTLY what I was looking for. An app that always displays traffic speed but not in the status bar and take up space. I don\'t think any other app can match this. My search ends here.  Also I didn\'t know what data saving is until I came across this app. Good thing I have root!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I fully agree download this application
reviews.author: uday kumar
